subject: RE: [junit] fresher doubt
msgSnippet: ... That s really unbelievable! :) Seriously, it s quite a good book. Unit Testing in Java is good, too. See http://faq.javaranch.com/view?GoodBooksOnTesting
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

> Why on Earth don't you have a copy of _JUnit Recipes_!? Several
> hundred of your friends do!

That's really unbelievable! :)

Seriously, it's quite a good book. "Unit Testing in Java" is good, too.

See http://faq.javaranch.com/view?GoodBooksOnTesting for reviews.

Cheers, Ilja
